LanguageData.ApparelDamagedPrude.stages.0.label: Llevo ropa desgastada
LanguageData.ApparelDamagedPrude.stages.0.description: Mi atuendo es bastante malo. It's getting revealing...
LanguageData.ApparelDamagedPrude.stages.1.label: Levo ropa hecha jirones
LanguageData.ApparelDamagedPrude.stages.1.description: Estoy usando un pedazo de basura hecha jirones. Everyone can see right through it!
LanguageData.Individuality.stages.0.label: matching apparel
LanguageData.Individuality.stages.0.description: Someone else in the colony is wearing the exact same things as me. It's awkward.
LanguageData.Individuality.stages.1.label: matching apparel
LanguageData.Individuality.stages.1.description: Other people in the colony wear the exact same things as me. It's offputting.
LanguageData.Individuality.stages.2.label: stifled individuality
LanguageData.Individuality.stages.2.description: Most of the colony wears the exact same things. It's creepy, and I want to express my individuality.
LanguageData.Individuality.stages.3.label: stifled individuality
LanguageData.Individuality.stages.3.description: Everyone here wears the exact same things! It's deeply unsettling, and I want to express my individuality.
